name: Single-Sign On (SSO)
description:
Following can be used as Reference Material, but is not necessarily inclusive of the cases within this suite:
[SSO into MPV (iOS)](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9688) 
[SSO_Flow_MPV_PVO](https://docs.google.com/document/d/19w1UbZbIgqtxB-lFv4PuUQ03h_T_Zr31/edit?pli=1)
[Ballpark SSO Use cases](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1n2ofQTFb3CA5h8n_-ynT3KC2j1mFBhGU/edit#gid=1433928645)

Ballpark specific:
*[BP-9828](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9828) SSO into MPV - Webview deep link support
*[BP-9690](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9690) SSO into MPV - T-links will have user already signed into primary MLB account
*[BP-9829](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9829) Disable data dog monitoring in BPweb
*[BP-9862](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9862) Log when users attempt to purchase without SSO
*[BP-9863](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9863) End-to-End SSO Testing
*[BP-9813](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9813) Migration to support users who have not recently logged in to use SSO
